item.title: Disabling Buttons Put on Google Spreadsheet using Google Apps Script
item.description: Gists Description This is a sample script for disabling the buttons put on Google Spreadsheet using Google Apps Script. When a script is run by clicking a button on Google Spreadsheet, there is the case that you don't want to make users run the script in duplicate. This sample script achieves this situation. Demo In this demonstration, 2 types of buttons are used. Those are the drawing and image, respectively. When the button is clicked, the worker of 10 seconds is run.
